interstimulus_interval.Description: Interval between stimuli presentations in seconds

Levels.Congruent: Word and facial expression are congruent
Levels.Incongruent: Word and facial expression are incongruent

Levels.pCI: postcongruent incongruent - congruent followed by incongruent
Levels.pII: postincongruent incongruent - incongruent followed by incongruent

target_condition.Description: Target facial emotion presented to participants

distractor.Description: Distractor text overlayed on target facial emotion

response.Description: Response made by participant (identify the underlying facial emotion while ignoring an overlaying emotion word

database.Description: NIMH Child Emotional Faces Picture Set (NIMH-ChEFS). See Egger et al, 2011 (https://doi.org/10.1002/mpr.343)
